identifier: Ontology for vehicles in the automotive industry.

definition_en: A vehicle is a motor-powered road vehicle that transports people or cargo (not operated on rails).
note_en: we include only motorised road vehicles, i.e. we exclude: aircrafts, watercraft, railway vehicle, human powered vehicles
synonyms_en: motor vehicle, road vehicle, motorised vehicle

definition_en: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) is a unique serial number used by the automotive industry to identify individual motor vehicles.
Is a unique identifier for vehicle types.
A short text indicating the configuration of the vehicle, e.g. '5dr hatchback ST 2.5 MT 225 hp' or 'limited edition'.

Indicates whether the vehicle has been used for special purposes, like commercial rental, driving school, or as a taxi. The legislation in many countries requires this information to be revealed when offering a car for sale.
A vehicle that transports people or cargo for payment.
A vehicle that is used for private purposes.
A vehicle that is used for commercial purposes.
A vehicle that is part of a fleet.
< 9 passengers, based on car platform, to transport passengers
synonyms_en: multi-purpose vehicle (MPV), van, multi utility vehicle (MUV), Asian Utility Vehicle (AUV)

example_en: 2er, B-class, Touran, C-Max, Picasso, Scenic, Zafira, Jogger

definition_en: small MPV, smallest size, based on hatchbacks (B-segment), < 4.1 m
example_en: A2, A-class, B-Max, ix20, 500L, Jazz, Yaris, Space Star, Venga, Meriva
Carry, Porter, Wagon R, Agila, Ignis, Move
Citan, Caddy, Kangoo, Berlingo, Doblo, Dokker
synonyms_en: leisure activity vehicle (LAV), van-based MPV, small passenger van
microbus, minicoach, full-size van, large passenger van
large goods vehicle (LGV), or heavy goods vehicle (HGV)

definition_en: A conversion van is a full-sized cargo van that is sent to third-party companies to be outfitted with various luxuries for road trips and camping.

synonyms_en: semitrailer, big rig, semitruck, semi, eighteen-wheeler, semitrailer
armoured van, armored cash transport car, security van, or armored truck

definition_en: are powered solely by an electric motor, using electricity stored in an on-board battery.
combine an internal combustion engine and an electric motor that assists the conventional engine, for example during vehicle acceleration.
are powered by an electric motor and an internal combustion engine that work together or separately.
synonyms_en: Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle (PHEV), new energy vehicle (NEV)
Fuel Cell Electric Vehicle (FCEV), fuel cell vehicle (FCV)
full-size luxury car, luxury saloon car

definition_en: commercial truck classification is determined based on the vehicle's gross vehicle weight rating (GVWR)

synonyms_en: Association of Car Rental Industry Systems Standards (ACRISS)
